welcome_message_body: Welcome to Barreiras, Brazil! Known for its beautiful landscapes and vibrant culture, we invite you to explore and enjoy the charm of our city during your visit.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Barreiras Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
